Infectum.turoyo: korəzaʕlayye u=taʕlokulyawm-d-ḥušabo, k-omər: lo=quṭlitu w lo=zonetu 97; prs 226/20; w-hiyegd-oṯe-wagd-omar-wa ono k-aṯino, b-riše d-i=šato, wayaxut b-u=ʕeḏo, d-koraznoaʕlayxu, u=dino d-i=ṭayuṯomək=k-omər
translations: ‘And he (officer, m.) used to come and say: “I have come – (and that was on the New Year day or on the feast days) – to preach to you what the religion of Islam says”
